a.span: Pacific reef sharks have declined by more than 90 percent, new study says

if (w < 1060) { return 'jfk-tiny'; } else if (w < 1252) { return 'jfk-small'; } } return 'jfk-normal'; }; function setupElasticClasses() { try { var jfkClasses = [ getJfkSizeClass() ]; var w = window.innerWidth || document.body.clientWidth; if (w < 760) { jfkClasses.push('news-skinny'); } else if (w < 970) { jfkClasses.push('news-narrow'); } else { jfkClasses.push('news-normal'); } document.documentElement.className = jfkClasses.join(' '); } catch (e) { /** do nothing **/ } try { var sectionStreamEl = document.getElementById('section-stream'); if (sectionStreamEl) { var streamWidth = sectionStreamEl.offsetWidth; var classes = sectionStreamEl.className.split(' '); if (streamWidth < 630) { classes.push('ss-narrow'); } else { classes.push('ss-normal'); } sectionStreamEl.className = classes.join(' '); } } catch (e) { /** do nothing **/ } }; setupElasticClasses();
